DOC.brief_summary: R(+)pramipexole is administered in escalating doses to patients with early ALS. Plasma and spinal fluid levels of R(+)PPX are monitored, in addition to biochemical markers of oxidative stress.
DOC.brief_title: R(+)PPX High Dose Treatment of ALS
DOC.criteria: definite ALS no prior exposure to R(+)PPX ALSFRS at baseline <40 FVC at baseline <70%
